caption.p: Flower of Hydnora abyssinica: ( A) H. abyssinica plant growing, ( B) images of other young H. abyssinica plant, ( C) internal part of the flower, ( D) fruit containing seeds white like rice, ( E– G) floral parts; Ea—osmophores, Ga—androecial part, Gc—antheral rings, ( F) outer part of the H. abyssinica plant.
